NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: Coleus! It is good to see you well, my friend. I apologize for sending Cycad in my place to find you! I would have loved to visit your <color=orange>mining site on Timber Hearth</color> again.
2
1
YARROW: Was Cycad able to inform you about the matter I would like you to investigate before sending you my way?
3
2
COLEUS: This is perplexing.. Yarrow, I have inspected both warp towers on Ash Twin, but I must conclude that their mechanisms are perfectly operable and are unlikely to be the cause of any malfunction.
4
3
COLEUS: An update: Yarrow, please come to the other warp tower at once. I believe I may have a hypothesis regarding the phenomenon at last!
5
2
COLEUS: He has, and the matter puzzled me enough to leave my work at the mines! Please allow me some time to inspect each of the towers, and I should be able to give you an update you on the issue soon!
6
5
YARROW: You have my thanks, Coleus! I'm sure you will be able to locate the problem right away.
